ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 24 Pet, and related questions
ygData.msgSnippet: same thing w/ me, I had a lvl 14 wizard and got tired of diying made a necro got 22nd, then made a Shaman got 40 my necro is now 26th and my Shaman is 40 I
ygData.messageBody:
same thing w/ me, I had a lvl 14 wizard and got tired of diying made a necro got 22nd, then made a Shaman got 40 my necro is now 26th and my Shaman is 40 I love them both!! Necro for soloing is better, Shaman is better in groups, for healing and buffs.  Plus at 40 my Shaman has a pet too.  ;-)  there are a lot of cool classes.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Nat Russo
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 10:53 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 24 Pet, and related questions

From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>

Same thing happened to me and my 22 wiz.  I just couldn't take it anymore,
so I started a DE Necro.  Around the same time, a friend of mine was getting
tired of his 24 warrior, and did the same thing.  We haven't looked back
since, and have now outlevelled our original characters.  Best choice we
ever made.

Faction is NOT a problem, so don't let that discourage you.  You just learn
to pack a lot with you when you go on extended travels.  I'm about to hit
lvl 24 and haven't even needed to set foot in North Freeport or Feydwer in
all this time.  There are always ways to raise faction, some of which are
much easier than you might think.  I did the "Note for Rebby" and "Note for
Janam" quests simultaneously for about 2 hours.  I went from barly tolerated
to "warmly" in East and West freeport.

Mujahid  23 Necro  Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [mailto:pwhite@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 9:53 AM
> To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 24 Pet, and related questions
>
>
> From: Peck White <pwhite@...>
>
> Ok, Thanks for the info.  Thanks to you also, Cory.
>
> On a side note.  I started Alazzar because I got discouraged with my level
> 23 bard.  I just got tired of dieing all the time.
>
> Well last night I made 2 1/2 bubbles of xp in 2 1/2 hours.  My bard never
> did this in his life.  I was amazed at how quickly my pet and I
> were mowing
> thru mobs with no downtime at all.  I am looking forward to
> playing Alazzar,
> I'm just going to have to get used to the faction thing.  I haven't had to
> deal with it yet.
>
> Good hunting,
>
> Alazzar
>
>
>
This list is basically unmoderated.  However abusive language will not be tolerated
